page.description: Specify how the user will open the Detail View. The 'programmatic' option allows you to create your own event handler. Your event handler should execute the {grid.object}.detailView(rowNumber) method. Depending on where the event is defined you may be able to use {grid.rowNumber) for the 'rowNumber' parameter.
